original_problem_description: An event organizer wants to maximize revenue by optimizing ticket prices for different seating zones, considering demand and viewer experience. The goal is to set prices that maximize overall revenue.

questions.vague_problem_description: An event organizer wants to optimize ticket prices for different seating zones with an objective related to revenue and viewer experience.
questions.clarifying_question: Does the event organizer aim to maximize revenue, balance revenue with maintaining a high viewer experience, or has another specific objective in mind?

questions.vague_problem_description: An event organizer aims to set ticket prices for different seating zones taking into account the demand.
questions.clarifying_question: Are there any constraints on the price range for the tickets, or minimum and maximum prices that must be adhered to for each seating zone?

questions.vague_problem_description: An event organizer seeks to maximize revenue by adjusting ticket prices for different seating zones, considering viewer experience.
questions.clarifying_question: Is the organizer looking to adjust prices dynamically based on real-time data, or set a static price before the event starts?
